nylasGetCalendarEvents.description: Retrieves calendar events from Nylas within a specified time range

parameters.limit: Maximum number of events to return

nylasCreateCalendarEvent.description: Creates a new calendar event in Nylas

parameters.title: Event title
parameters.startTime: Start time (Unix timestamp or ISO string)
parameters.endTime: End time (Unix timestamp or ISO string)

parameters.limit: Maximum number of emails to return

nylasGetEmail.description: Retrieves a specific email by ID

nylasGetEvent.description: Retrieves a specific calendar event by ID

nylasFindAvailableSlots.description: Finds available time slots in calendar

parameters.emails: List of email addresses to check

nylasBatchCreateEvents.description: Creates multiple calendar events at once

parameters.events: Array of event objects to create

nylasMoveEvent.description: Moves an event to a new time slot

nylasCheckGrantStatus.description: Check if a user has an active Nylas grant for email/calendar/contacts access

parameters.userEmail: Email of user to check (optional, defaults to current user)

nylasListCompanyGrants.description: List all users in the company with active Nylas grants (admin only)

nylasSendInvitation.description: Send a Nylas grant invitation email to onboard a new user (admin only)

parameters.email: Email address of person to invite

nylasRevokeGrant.description: Revoke a user's Nylas grant and remove their email/calendar/contacts access (admin only)

parameters.userEmail: Email of user whose grant to revoke

nylasGetContacts.description: Retrieve contacts from user's address book

parameters.userEmail: Email of user whose contacts to retrieve (optional, defaults to current user)
parameters.limit: Maximum number of contacts to return (optional)

nylasCreateContact.description: Create a new contact in user's address book

parameters.userEmail: Email of user whose address book to add contact to (optional)

nylasUpdateContact.description: Update an existing contact in user's address book

parameters.userEmail: Email of user whose contact to update (optional)
